data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 2, Throw-in high up the field for Sao Paulo in Salvador.
Bahia needs to be cautious. Sao Paulo have an attacking throw-in.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a throw-in for Sao Paulo, close to Bahia's area.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Bahia.
Rossi of Bahia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 6, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
Sao Paulo pushes forward through Brenner, whose finish on goal is saved.
Bahia drives forward and Rodriguinho gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 9, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo drive forward but Reinaldo is judged offside.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Bahia.
In the minute 13, Rodriguinho's header is off-target for Bahia.
Goal kick for Sao Paulo at Arena Fonte Nova.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 16, Brenner for Sao Paulo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Sao Paulo are pushing forward but Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
Ball goes out of play for a Bahia goal kick.
In the minute 22, Can Bahia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sao Paulo's half?
Important block from the Bahia defence as Brenner fires in a strike for Sao Paulo.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 25, Sao Paulo push upfield and Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Bahia defence.
Bahia have a dangerous throw-in.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 27, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ernando.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Tiago Volpi for Sao Paulo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 34, Tiago Volpi is back on the pitch.
Bahia's Ernando is back in action after a slight knock.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo in their own half.
In the minute 36, Free kick Sao Paulo.
Can Sao Paulo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Bahia's half?
Sao Paulo have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match at Arena Fonte Nova has been interrupted briefly for a check on Alesson, who is down injured.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 41, Alesson returns to the field for Bahia after picking up a slight injury.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Throw-in high up the field for Sao Paulo in Salvador.
In the minute 43, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Bahia's Alesson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sao Paulo defender.
Corner awarded to Bahia.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Sao Paulo in their own half.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
7 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Bahia throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Bahia's Gregore is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Bahia.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 45, Bahia surge into the attack at Arena Fonte Nova but Rossiâ€™s header is off-target.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Sao Paulo a goal kick.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In Salvador, Robert Arboleda (Sao Paulo) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
8 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Salvador.
In the minute 46, Bahia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Bahia.
Sao Paulo make their first substitution with Tche Tche replacing Juanfran.
Fernando Diniz is making the team's second substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Vitor Bueno replacing Leo Pele.
In the minute 47, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Bahia are in shooting range from this free kick.
Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara is booked for the away team.
In the minute 48, In Salvador Bahia drive forward through Rossi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Dani Alves (Sao Paulo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 49, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a Bahia throw-in in Sao Paulo's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Salvador.
Luciano gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sao Paulo.
In the minute 51, Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
Sao Paulo drive upfield and Robert Arboleda gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bahia defender.
Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards the home team a throw-in.
Sao Paulo to take a throw-in in Bahia territory.
In the minute 52, Goal! Luciano gives Sao Paulo a 0-1 lead.
Can Sao Paulo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Bahia needs to be cautious. Sao Paulo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 55, Throw-in Bahia.
Free kick for Bahia in the half of Sao Paulo.
Sao Paulo pushes forward through Dani Alves, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Sao Paulo.
Bahia push forward at Arena Fonte Nova and Rodriguinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sao Paulo defence.
Igor Gomes of Sao Paulo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 61, Leandro Pedro Vuaden awards Bahia a goal kick.
Rodriguinho of Bahia is pulled up for offside.
Elber is on a sub for Ramon for Bahia.
In the minute 63, The home team have replaced Rodriguinho with Daniel. This is the second substitution made today by Mano Menezes.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
Mano Menezes (Bahia) is making a third substitution, with Saldanha replacing Alesson.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Sao Paulo close to the penalty box.
In the minute 66, Sao Paulo move into a more comfortable 0-2 lead. Robert Arboleda is the scorer with a header!
That's a fine assist from Reinaldo.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Sao Paulo goal kick.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Salvador, Daniel of Bahia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 74, Goal! Sao Paulo extend their lead to 0-3 through Luciano.
Great play from Reinaldo to set up the goal.
The home team replace Rossi with Clayson.
In the minute 75, Nino Paraiba is replacing Elias for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Saldanha of Bahia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Sao Paulo have a goal kick.
In the minute 77, In Salvador a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Sao Paulo in the half of Bahia.
Free kick for Sao Paulo in the half of Bahia.
In the minute 80, Edson (Bahia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Great shot from Bahia's Saldanha but he is denied by the crossbar.
Clayson strikes to reduce the deficit to 1-3 at Arena Fonte Nova.
In the minute 81, Nino Paraiba instrumental with a fine assist.
Fernando Diniz is making the team's third substitution at Arena Fonte Nova with Pablo Felipe replacing Luciano.
Fernando Diniz (Sao Paulo) is making a fourth substitution, with Hernanes replacing Gabriel Davi Gomes Sara.
In the minute 84, Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Sao Paulo just outside Bahia's area.
Sao Paulo drives forward and Robert Arboleda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 85, Brenner (Sao Paulo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Rodrigo Nestor Bertalia is replacing Igor Gomes for the away team.
Dani Alves (Sao Paulo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Sao Paulo have been awarded a corner by Leandro Pedro Vuaden.
In the minute 86, Throw-in Sao Paulo.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Salvador, Brenner of Sao Paulo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Salvador.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Leandro Pedro Vuaden signals a free kick to Bahia.
Sao Paulo's Tche Tche misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Bahia at Arena Fonte Nova.
Free kick Bahia.
The match has come to a close in Salvador. The final score is 1-3.
